name: Deterministic Rebellion
description:
Play as the chosen warrior of the mechanicnoids, a race of robots that believe in Determinism. They have found the tower of Random and fight to bring it down along with RNGesus' influence. Thus freeing them from unknowable outcomes!

RNGesus knows your plans though and has sent their army to stop you! How long can you hold out against the onslaught?!
